name: Initial I: A Man Giving a Goblet to a Man and Another Man Killed by Hanging; Initial I: A Man Disrobing and Another Man Led Away by Soldiers
description: Initial I: A Man Giving a Goblet to a Man and Another Man Killed by Hanging; Initial I: A Man Disrobing and Another Man Led Away by Soldiers; Unknown, Michael Lupi de Çandiu (Spanish, active Pamplona, Spain 1297 - 1305); Northeastern Spain, Spain; about 1290 - 1310; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 36.5 x 24 cm (14 3/8 x 9 7/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIV 6, fol. 256; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
